item.description:
UPDATE: Please Update your RSVPs. We have not invited any other groups to this Sundays event. All Natives are encouraged to bring friends, guests and other Pats fans. We will be on the lower level of Game On. Ask the hostess or ask for Sonja to direct you to our section. Arrive early before Game Time if you would like to enter tne the Game On Football Challenge. Batting cages anyone?

Please join us for a 2012 RED SOX NATIVES EXCLUSIVE EVENT! 

Join us at Game On! for a Patriots Game Viewing Party to watch the New England Patriots take on the Arizona Cardinals in Foxboro on Sunday, September 16. 

Come early at 12:30pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game Time is 1:00pm.

Game On! Employee and Red Sox Native Sonja has kindly arranged for us to have 2 sky box sections on the lower level to watch the game. We will have our own server. The full menu will be available to order food from.

As an added SURPRISE the Red Sox batting cages may be available for any Native wanting to take batting practice. This has been a big hit at past Game On! gatherings. Just ask Mindy.

AND  We will also be able to watch the Red Sox road game from Toronto at 1:00pm.   

There is no event fee for our reserved section. 

Stay for the whole game or leave when ever. 

We will be inviting some guests. Check back for updates.

The Red Sox Natives organized weekly Patriots viewing parties last year with guests from several other invited groups attending. We had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Game On! will be one of our venues for watching 2012 New England Patriots games. We have been to numerous Baseball and sports related events at Game On! over the past several years. 

Game On! is conveniently located next to Fenway Park and public transportation. Street parking is also available if you arrive early on Sundays.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO AND TIP YOUR SERVER.

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there.

Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Sonja has reserved two Sky Boxes on the lower level. Ask the hostess to direct you to The Red Sox Natives section.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party at Game On! - Arizona Cardinals at Patriots Home Game
